title: Microsoft 365 Copilot & Agent Administration Fundamentals
subtitle: Master AI Administration in Microsoft 365
description: Learn to administer Microsoft 365 Copilot and AI agents, including licensing, data protection, governance, and agent management
overview: This fundamentals course prepares you for the AB-900 certification exam by covering the core features of Microsoft 365 services, data protection and governance for Copilot, and basic administrative tasks for Copilot and agents. You will learn to manage Copilot licensing, monitor usage and adoption, configure data security with Microsoft Purview, and create and manage AI agents in your organization.

learningObjectives.title: Microsoft 365 Core Features & Objects
learningObjectives.description: Identify core features, objects, and security principles of Microsoft 365 services including Exchange Online, SharePoint, and Teams

learningObjectives.title: Microsoft 365 Security Principles
learningObjectives.description: Understand Zero Trust, authentication methods, conditional access, and Microsoft Entra capabilities

learningObjectives.title: Data Protection & Governance for Copilot
learningObjectives.description: Learn Microsoft Purview features for information protection, DLP, insider risk management, and data security posture management for AI

learningObjectives.title: Copilot Administration & Monitoring
learningObjectives.description: Assign Copilot licenses, manage billing policies, monitor usage and adoption through Copilot Analytics

learningObjectives.title: Agent Creation & Management
learningObjectives.description: Create agents, configure user access, understand approval processes, and monitor agent lifecycle

modules.title: Core Features and Objects of Microsoft 365
modules.description: Identify core objects and security features across Microsoft 365 services
topics: License types and their impact on Microsoft 365 feature access
Organization configuration via the Microsoft 365 admin center
Exchange Online admin center: mailboxes and distribution lists
SharePoint admin center: sites, libraries, folders, and permissions
Teams admin center: teams, channels, and policies
Zero Trust principles and authentication methods
Microsoft Entra features and conditional access policies
Single sign-on (SSO) and Privileged Identity Management (PIM)

modules.title: Data Protection and Governance for Microsoft 365 and Copilot
modules.description: Understand Microsoft Purview capabilities and data security implications of Copilot
topics: Microsoft Purview Information Protection and Data Loss Prevention (DLP)
Insider Risk Management and Communication Compliance
Data Security Posture Management (DSPM) for AI
Sensitivity labels and data classification
How Copilot accesses data via Microsoft Graph
How permissions and controls protect against Copilot risks
Responsible AI principles
Identifying oversharing in SharePoint and data access governance
SharePoint Advanced Management and restricted site access

modules.title: Administrative Tasks for Copilot and Agents
modules.description: Perform basic administrative tasks for Copilot and agents
topics: Comparing built-in capabilities of Copilot and agents
Copilot monthly license model vs. pay-as-you-go
Enabling and disabling Copilot features
Use cases for Researcher and Analyst agents
Use cases for custom agents
Assigning Copilot licenses and managing billing policies
Monitoring Copilot usage with Copilot Analytics and admin center
Creating, approving, and monitoring agents
Managing prompts: saving, sharing, scheduling, and deleting

handsOnLabs.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center Exploration
handsOnLabs.description: Navigate the Microsoft 365 admin center and explore organization configurations, licensing, and security settings

handsOnLabs.title: Microsoft Purview Data Protection
handsOnLabs.description: Configure sensitivity labels, DLP policies, and explore Data Security Posture Management for AI

handsOnLabs.title: Copilot Licensing & Monitoring
handsOnLabs.description: Assign Copilot licenses, configure billing policies, and review Copilot Analytics dashboards

handsOnLabs.title: Agent Creation & Management
handsOnLabs.description: Create an agent, configure user access, and monitor agent usage through the admin center

prerequisites: Basic understanding of security and identity concepts
No prior Copilot or AI experience required

certification.name: Microsoft 365 Certified: Copilot and Agent Administration Fundamentals

personalStory.story: With the rise of AI in the workplace, managing Copilot has become one of the most asked-about topics by our enterprise clients. I've helped organizations roll out Copilot to thousands of users while keeping their data governance airtight. This course covers everything I wish administrators knew before their first Copilot deployment.
